p: We further selected all the grids from MODIS-based and MLA-based ET to compare them to our simulations. The results showed a poor correlation between CoLM-estimated and MODIS-estimated ET ( R 2 = 0.25, Slope = 0.85, and RMSE = 108 mm/year), but a moderate correlation between MLA-estimated and CoLM-estimated ET ( R 2 = 0.56, Slope = 0.89, and RMSE = 68 mm/year) ( Fig 5).
